title: Campbell Serves Up Reassurance
sub_head: Strong results from Campbell suggest food companies are seeing resilient demand amid inflation
body:
Campbell Soup is once again comfort food.
The companyâ€™s strong quarterly earnings report on Wednesday will reassure investors that major food brands are working as defensive plays in their portfolios. Most crucially, two rounds of price increases by the company to offset cost inflation are stabilizing margins with only a minor impact on end-consumer demand.
